K10sf276_sc:wal1_0: evaṁ mayā śrutam | ekasamayaṁ bhagavāṁ caṁpāyāṁ viharati gargarapuṣkariṇyās tīre |
K10sf276_sc:wal2_0: tena khalu samayena rāhuṇā asurendreṇa sarvaṁ candramaṇḍalam āvṛtaṁ |
K10sf276_sc:wal3_0: atha yā devatā tasmiṁ candramaṇḍale sthitā bhītā trastā saṁvignā hṛṣṭaromakūpā yena
K10sf276_sc:wal3_1: bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma | upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte ’sthāt | ekāntasthitā
K10sf276_sc:wal4_0: namas te buddha vīrāstu vipramuktāya savataḥ |
K10sf276_sc:wal5_0: loke sugatam arhantaṁ candramāḥ śaraṇaṁ gataḥ |
K10sf276_sc:wal7_0: … | saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ | saṁtvaramāṇo ’sau rāhuś candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭaḥ ||
K10sf276_sc:wal8_0: tena samayena baḍir virocanapautra āsīd asuraḥ | adrākṣīd baḍir virocanapautro rāhuṇā asurendreṇa tvaritatvaritaṁ candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭam dṛṣṭvā ca tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe ||
K10sf276_sc:wal9_0: kiṁ nu saṁtvaramāṇas tvaṁ rāhuś candraṁ vimuñcasi | saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ ||
K10sf276_sc:wal10_0: rāhur avocat || saptadhā me sphalen mūrdhā jīvan na sukham āpnuyāṁ tatra buddhābhigītena muñceyaṁ śaśinaṁ na cet ||
